instructions: On your Android phone, open Datally . Tap the Emergency bank . Tap on Add Balance Details . To get started, check your balance from your carrier. Enter how much data you want to reserve in the Emergency Data Reserve field. Enter how much data you have available in your Current Data Balance . Note that your Current Data Balance must be larger than the Emergency Data Reserve. To set when you want the Emergency Data Reserve to expire, click Tap to set expiry date . Tap Confirm . If the Turn on Data Saver window pops up, click Turn On .
